titles.title: Praise Waiteth For Thee, O Lord, Praise Waiteth For Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord, praise waiteth for Thee
Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord, waiteth for Thee in Zion.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Who so offereth praise, O Lord, glorifieth Thee
Who so offereth praise, O Lord, glorifies Thee in Zion.
